SEARCH
Package Menus

Class BaseMenu<T extends IService>

Object
BaseMenu<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of service associated with the menu, which must implement the IService interface.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMenu<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorMenu, DoctorMenu, PatientMenu, PharmacistMenu
public abstract class BaseMenu<T extends IService> extends Object implements IMenu<T>
Abstract base class for creating menu-driven user interfaces. Provides shared functionality for handling user actions such as updating personal information, changing passwords, and selecting options from a list.

  • Method Details

    • baseMenu

      public void baseMenu(String currentUserId, Scanner sc)
      Sets up the menu for the current user and handles first login requirements. If this is the user's first login, prompts them to change their password.
      Specified by:
      baseMenu in interface IMenu<T extends IService>
      Parameters:
      currentUserId - the ID of the current user.
      sc - the Scanner object for reading user input.

    • nextInt

      protected int nextInt()
      Reads next int from input, handling exception if input is not int
      Returns:
      Integer input from user

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword()
      Prompts the user to change their password and updates it in the system.

    • updatePersonalInformation

      public void updatePersonalInformation()
      Provides the user with options to update their personal information (e.g., name, email, contact number). Updates the chosen field using the corresponding service method.

    • printAllAndChooseOne

      protected int printAllAndChooseOne(Collection<?> objects)
      Displays a list of options and prompts the user to select one. Ensures the user's selection is valid before proceeding.
      Parameters:
      objects - the collection of options to display.
      Returns:
      the index of the selected option, or -1 if the collection is empty.
